description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Inappropriate implementation in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 123.0.6312.105 allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memory access via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

La implementación inapropiada en V8 en Google Chrome anterior a 123.0.6312.105 permitió a un atacante remoto realizar potencialmente un acceso a la memoria fuera de los límites a través de una página HTML manipulada. (Severidad de seguridad de Chrome: alta)
